text:
Los Angeles CA - KEYPR

We're redefining the guest experience at hotels worldwide! With our mobile app, guests can check in and go straight to their room. With our web app, hotels get real-time metrics and tools to track.

We're looking for front-end, back-end, mobile, and embedded/firmware engineers. We use Python, JavaScript, Android, iOS, C, and Clojure.

If you like challenging problems, please a short note to charles@keypr.com. Be sure to include your GitHub profile and links to code or any relevant work.

Cheers!
